thread.title: Fit for life with five top gadgets
thread.title_full: Fit for life with five top gadgets

title: Fit for life with five top gadgets
text: Fit for life with five top gadgets 7:18 AM Rod Chester and Jennifer Dudley-Nicholson From fashionable bracelets that count your steps to rugged watches for keen triathletes, these handy gadgets will help you keep in shape, write Rod Chester and Jennifer Dudley-Nicholson Giant asteroid will just miss Earth 7:00 AM MATTHEW DUNN THIS Halloween just got a whole lot scarier with the discovery of a huge asteroid hurtling towards Earth, although NASA is confident we will be fine. Time for a smartwatch comeback 7:00 AM Jennifer Dudley-Nicholson NATIONAL TECHNOLOGY EDITOR Six wearable gadgets are coming and this festive season looks more like a smartwatch season, with offerings from Samsung, Huawei, LG and more. Frozen doomsday vault cracked open 6:47 AM Megan Palin and AAP THIS James Bond-style bunker was built to ensure our survival in the event of a catastrophe. Now its crucial mission has been compromised. Sony shines with Xperia Z5 camera 6:00 AM Jennifer Dudley-Nicholson National technology editor Sony makes the great camera in the iPhone but has revealed an even better camera in its own flagship phone, the Xperia Z5. Lightning strikes, deluges lash city 5:04 AM Jessica Rapana TWO women were struck by lightning as furious rail, hail and thunder swept through Sydney’s southern and central regions for the second time in eight days. What really happened to Osama? 21:22 PM Emma Reynolds IT’S the question that won’t go away, creating a bitter war of words between the security experts: How did Osama bin Laden really die? Scientist gets his revenge on robbers 20:01 PM Lauren McMah A BURGLAR made a huge mistake breaking into the home of a CSIRO scientist, who has now developed a brilliant new CSI technique to catch other sticky-fingered crooks. Fit for life: five gadgets to keep you active from Jawbone, iFit, Garmin, Moov, Suunto October 21, 2015 6:32am Time to work out ... the Suunto Ambit3 Peak exercise-tracking watch. Rod Chester and Jennifer Dudley-Nicholson News Corp Australia Network Share
